page.description: Get a blob from a bigger blob.
page.original:
.PEEKB() Syntax New_Blob as B = .PEEKB( Position as N, Length as N ) ArgumentDescription PositionThe byte starting position for the read operation. LengthThe number of bytes to copy.
Description The .PEEKB() method returns a portion of a second blob variable. Example dim b1 as B dim b2 as B b1 = char_to_blob("AB") b2 = b1.peekb(1, 1) ? b2 = A
See Also Blob Functions and Methods
